client_description.Summary Note:
Idun Karen Petersen and the RM met at a financial seminar in Copenhagen. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
Idun Karen Petersen is a 22 year old and comes from Denmark.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
client_description.Family Background: Idun Karen Petersen is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description.Education Background: Idun finished secondary school at Københavns Åbent Gymnasium in 2021.
client_description.Occupation History:
Idun Karen Petersen is a 22 year old and comes from Denmark.
Idun Karen Petersen did not start her professional career yet.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
She did not save any money from her earnings.
Client does not have any properties.She inherited a significant sum of 19210000 DKK from her grandmother, a respected Corporate Lawyer, in 2017, which she has wisely invested.
client_description.Client Summary: The RM is excited to help Idun navigate the challenges of starting a career and building a strong financial foundation.
